ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Ph.D. Nguyen Xuan Minh Ai for great contributions to this study. This research is funded by Viet Nam National University Ho Chi Minh City (VNU-HCM) grant number: 562-2018-18-05 and partially supported by Grants-in-Aid from the JSPS Core-to-Core program, B. Asiaâ€“Africa Science Platforms, and sample collection was supported by the Bidoup Nui Ba National Park, Vietnam.
